title: PNB Housing Finance board to take call on fundraising on March 9 - The Financial Express
content: PNB Housing Finance board to take call on fundraising on March 9  The Financial Express
description: A meeting of the Board of Directors of PNB Housing Finance Limited is scheduled to be held on March 9 to consider fund raising options by issue of equity shares through appropriate methods (including rights issue), subject to requisite approvals, the company said in a regulatory filing on Friday.
